Description: Jumping during Clown Kart Dash (Side special --> Jump)
The attack available after Jr ejects using Abandon Ship (Up special, then attack)
A combo where you hit your opponent with the passive Kart Dash hitbox, Kart Jump, Abandon Ship, then Hammer swing. (Kart dash --> Kart jump --> Abandon Ship --> Hammer Swing)
Stands for Out of kart, refers to the state where you have used up special and can only hammer swing.
Down throw MK off stage and above the ledge as an edgeguard. This can combo into a fair to kill at higher percents, or can setup for more edgeguarding.
Refers to the dair frequently used after side b at low percents. If you do a Kart jump (or full hop) Dair, and don't land with the dair, opponents are sent at a better height for combos.
Stands for Parry Footstool Combo, a process which involves parrying an aerial attack, and footstooling your opponent to initiate a combo.
